name: Roll of the Dice (Anders Currah)
description:
Roll of the Dice is an endless top-down game where you maneuver a poker chip to avoid getting hit by cards. The game gets harder as you progress, but the difficulty is mostly dictated by the dice. Periodically, a roll will occur that will land a difficulty between 1-6, but if you don't like the roll that you got you can try to chase down a die for another chance. 

- play with sound
